TITLE.Text:
The Wayfarer â€“ Dive into the Dunes

Begin your descent?

END_REFUSAL.Text: You step back. The Stranger fades. The dunes forget your name. The story ends before it begins.

START.Text:
You arrive at a DEAD END sign half-swallowed by sand. But the sign is warm, breathing.

Do you trust it?

STRANGER.Text:
A stranger stitched from starlight holds out a map drawn in your own blood.

"Give me something unknown," he says.
You already know what he means.

NODE_0000.Text: A shadow crosses the dunes. It does not belong to you.

NODE_0001.Text: Wind cuts sideways, carrying a voice that hums your name.

NODE_0002.Text: You find a skeletal tree whose fruit whispers when touched.

NODE_0003.Text: The sand flows uphill for a moment, defying your eyes.

NODE_0004.Text: A low hum builds inside your teeth. Something is watching.

NODE_0005.Text: You step across a dry riverbed. The water is invisible but loud.

NODE_0006.Text: There is a well full of feathers. None are yours.

NODE_0007.Text: A sky-mark glows violet, pulsing in time with your heart.

NODE_0008.Text: You hear weeping underground. You feel it beneath your toes.

NODE_0009.Text: A black sail flaps on a mast buried in the dunes.

NODE_0010.Text: A shadow crosses the dunes. It does not belong to you.
